meanings.def: a drug or another form of medicine that you take to prevent or to treat an illness; treatment involving drugs
examples: Are you currently taking any medication?
The condition may require prolonged medication.
medication for something The doctor prescribed medication for his condition.
on medication (for something) She is on medication for depression.
Many flu medications are available without a prescription.
My grandmother has been on medication for years.
He talked with his doctor about changing his medication.
She stopped the medication because of side effects.
